metadata.title: CVE-2020-27790 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A floating point exception issue was discovered in UPX inPackLinuxElf64::invert_pt_dynamic() function of p_lx_elf.cpp file. Anattacker with a crafted input file could trigger this issue that couldcause a crash leading to a denial of service. The highest impact is toAvailability.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
